activities: Enverity Corporation develops and may host software applications for corporations, municipalities, schools and healthcare organizations, focusing on environmental, health and safety compliance.  In some cases, Enverity's software systems may handle individual employee medical records, human resources information and other data.
eucountries: Spain, Austria, France, Germany, Ireland, United Kingdom, Greece, Italy, Poland
recoursemech: private sector developed dispute resolution mechanisms that incorporate the Safe Harbor Framework and the EU Data Protection Authorities.
